pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service.utils

Interface MessageServiceUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageServiceUtilsImpl

    public interface MessageServiceUtils
    Interface used to perform operations for message service classes.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeReadStatus(Message message, String boxType)
      Changes the isRead status of the message depending on the type of the box.
      Message createNewMessage(User sender, User recipient, String subject, String text)
      Creates and returns the message with given parameters.
      void setReadStatusFalse(Message message, String boxType)
      Changes the isRead status of the message depending on the type of the box to FALSE.
      void setReadStatusTrue(Message message, String boxType)
      Changes the isRead status of the message depending on the type of the box to TRUE.

    • Method Detail

      • changeReadStatus

        void changeReadStatus(Message message,
                      String boxType)
        Changes the isRead status of the message depending on the type of the box.
        Parameters:
        message - The Message containing the message which status will be changed
        boxType - A String containing the name of the box ( inbox - sent )

      • setReadStatusTrue

        void setReadStatusTrue(Message message,
                       String boxType)
        Changes the isRead status of the message depending on the type of the box to TRUE.
        Parameters:
        message - The Message containing the message which status will be changed
        boxType - A String containing the name of the box ( inbox - sent )

      • setReadStatusFalse

        void setReadStatusFalse(Message message,
                        String boxType)
        Changes the isRead status of the message depending on the type of the box to FALSE.
        Parameters:
        message - The Message containing the message which status will be changed
        boxType - A String containing the name of the box ( inbox - sent )

      • createNewMessage

        Message createNewMessage(User sender,
                         User recipient,
                         String subject,
                         String text)
        Creates and returns the message with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        sender - The User containing the sender of the message
        recipient - The User containing the recipient of the message
        subject - The String containing the subject of the message
        text - The String containing the text of the message
        Returns:
        A Message representing the message with given parameters
